website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a mix of handy features and durability and functionality issues. However,  the lifetime warranty and inexpensive price makes it a reasonable deal.
pros: A basic, lightweight rake with a soft grip handle and hardened steel tines
Falls on the lower end of the price scale
Comes with the company's industry-leading lifetime warranty
cons: Head is shorter than others – around 7 1/3 inches
The lightweight build is great for smaller users, but not ideal for tackling heavy debris

customer_reviews.title: Very streamlined, sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Use it on our farm for landscaping, general use and as extended reach for getting ahold of items out of normal range. It doesn't have the center bending issues I've had with typical wood handle rock rakes or the outer welding weakness as well. I appreciate the lightweight feature when I use it for hooking things under decks, lower tree limbs etc. The metal hand also seems to be easier on the hands as we haven't had issues with blisters since we've been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Love this rake!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rake! It is so light-weight to use.... and so far it has held up great. It does what a rake is supposed to do, but with a whole lot less effort on the user's part! I use it from a wheelchair... and this rake is so much easier to handle than my old wood handle heavy-duty rake. The old one hasn't moved from it's spot in the tool shed since this one arrived!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley in OR

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: 2/3/18 Package arrived this morning with two shipping bags taped around each end with the middle exposed. A good dent in the area that I would grab the rake at times while working in the garden. Rack part was chipped. I guess that’s the risk off buying online. I have received other items like shovel’s in a box or wrapped better. I will learn how the product works this spring. I have several other Fiskars products that I enjoy using.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: This rake works great. I was surprised by how light it feels. I can actually use it with one hand! Despite its light weight, the construction feels solid, and so far I cannot find any issues with this Fiskars. It is well worth the extra price. I don't expect it to fall apart at the welding spots, like the cheap hardware megastore rake I used only a few times. When it comes to tools that you plan to use a lot, it is well worth to go for quality and good ratings over the price.
customer_reviews.author: 1a2b3c4z

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but great quality with a good feel in the hands.
customer_reviews.text: I like how light weight this product is. If you need a super heavy rake this won’t work. The tines are really good for top soil digging or chopping. I have chickens and it is great for chopping up compacted pine shavings or for digging topsoil dirt and grass so the chickens can take dirt baths. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lea everett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Lightweight, Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for raking up around a large tree that had been cut down and there was lots of varied debris. It served me well and was lightweight enough that it did not wear me out. It seems pretty strong. If it helps, I'm an older, small female.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Excuse me sir, do you have the tine?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Solid feel, heavy duty tines. My only concern is the way the rake and handles are mated, looks like a few spot welds. I have not had any problems thus far, but I did notice it. I'm not worried really, Fiskars warranty is above par, just file a claim online through their easy to use website claim system, and you get a replacement part or product in the mail. Couldn't be easier...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Yard Buster
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to believe, but I have never held a rake like this, it is extremely light but incredibly strong. When I first received this rake I thought it would never hold up to the rocks in my yard but it proved me wrong. This rake is one tough son of a gun. You can use this rake all day in the toughest soils and your arms won't get tired. I highly recommend this yard buster
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ass
customer_reviews.text: Best rake ever. Even wife proof. She never puts stuff up and weather has ruined all my hand tools. Not any more
customer_reviews.author: mike durham

customer_reviews.title: A fine addition to the "arsenal"!
customer_reviews.text: I am greatly pleased with this rake, the handle is solidly welded to the tines and overall a well-made and solid product. The tines themselves are a little small (2 5/8') yet this product is extremely lightweight and a joy to use. Yea Fiskars!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressive Rake
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to maintain my artificial turf that has a natural rock border. It is gentle enough on the turf, yet strong enough to move the river rocks into place. It's super lightweight so I don't get tired raking either. Win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Handley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet very strong and well made. Tines are metal while handle is a very strong aluminum.
customer_reviews.text: I'm weak but get occasional bursts of energy for a little gardening. This very lightweight yet strong, hard-tined rake makes this type of raking possible when I couldn't before with my heavy one. Sturdy and well made. No fear of it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duff

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Helps to rake up weeds with long roots,would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Nihart

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, functional, great warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Super light-weight rake that feels sturdy enough. Typically, you pull the rake toward you, which doesn't stress the light-weight handle like a shovel would. Great warranty with Fiskars.
customer_reviews.author: DABBLE

customer_reviews.title: Ergo....NO!
customer_reviews.text: This rake hurts and clogs easily. Didn't pick up much. I could've gotten a much cheaper, bigger rake, to hurt just as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Saveyourmoney

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly tough
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this works! It seems pretty unassuming until you put it to work. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff & Things

customer_reviews.title: This is the lightest rake I have ever used, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest rake I have ever used, but the shaft is still strong enough to handle any job I have thrown at it. It is a little more expensive then others, but with a lifetime warranty it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christohper B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this rake. It's easy for me to use and I'm not one for gardening or yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: very light and it seems tough if it was built like the new shovels it would be
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much yet, very light and it seems tough if it was built like the new shovels it would be great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rake
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum handle makes this a light rake for ease of use. I have used it to rake mulch, soil. magnolia leaves and other items. It is strong and very easy to clean. This rake looks good and works well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Easy raking!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rake! I hate yard work but was excited to get this. It helped get all of the dead grass off the lawn (or soon to be lawn) with ease. Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Massey

customer_reviews.title: Very good rake
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sturdy. Love the cushion handle. Really tears that dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ninadetusojos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great and lightweight shovel. Sturdier than you might imagine.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING QUALITY & MODESTLY PRICED👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: This rake is wonderful to use all day long. It's light weight and durable finish is an absolute godsend over, any other rakes in its class! I love Fiskars Garden tools, all are of the highest quality and Modestly PRICED!👍
customer_reviews.author: John Vargason

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake
customer_reviews.text: Nice rake. Very lightweight but sturdy enough to rake dirt and gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Omar

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, very strong and no splinters
customer_reviews.text: This rake really is amazing. I wouldn't have thought the weight of a rake could make so much difference. At age 80, the light weight is such a help. Since it is aluminum, there is no wood to get all splintery (for you folks who like me are not super tidy and don't get your tools in out of the rain).
customer_reviews.author: Alice D.

customer_reviews.title: nice quality rake
customer_reviews.text: nice quality rake , better than the picture makes it look . very light weight but strong . i would buy again , and recomend to friends .
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Rock raking
customer_reviews.text: Light as a feather but strong as an ox--raking out palm sized or smaller rocks from soil.
customer_reviews.author: Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Best rake ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest and lightest rake I have ever owned. If you are reading this stop looking around and just buy this rake. You will not regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake
customer_reviews.text: Best rake I've ever used, very strong and well made and works very well, though I'd like to find something to add a little weight to put on the tooth end to get a better bite in the clay around my house because of the light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective garden rake I've ever owned/used. I'll never use another!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth.Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Best all purpose garden rake period.
customer_reviews.text: Great garden rake. Very light weight. Feels strong. I wouldn't want any other rake.
customer_reviews.author: Tenderg Host

customer_reviews.title: Has some give to go easy on your arms
customer_reviews.text: Light. Has some give to go easy on your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Collette

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: light but sturdy. feels good in the hand and easy on the back. excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: lovjim

customer_reviews.title: and like someone already said it just look and feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the Fiskars shovel and it is monster of a garden tool! I bought this rake thinking it would look and feel the same!? but honestly it looks and feels flimsy and delicate! and like someone already said it just look and feel like an ordinary, but overpriced garden tool! I sure hope it lasts as long as my last one; as it lasted ten years!
customer_reviews.author: L. Delvalle

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the perfect rake. It's solid without being heavy. It's true the prong base is not very wide. You'll be grateful for it when you're working around trees and shrubs. The prongs are sturdy and grip the pine needles and leaves without pulling up the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars makes the best of everything!
customer_reviews.text: I buy Fiskars everything and the only thing I've had an issue with was my leaf rake broke, but with a lifetime warranty, I shouldn't have a problem getting it replaced. Fiskars needs to sell more products in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

customer_reviews.title: I have used rack in work for years and would have saved so mutch time and body aches with a rack like this. It is truly a perfect rack and ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW WOW WOW!!!! I have used rack in work for years and would have saved so mutch time and body aches with a rack like this. It is truly a perfect rack and a joy to use. so light and great controll.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Albers

customer_reviews.title: Rake is very lightweight which may not be good for raking heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Rake is very lightweight which may not be good for raking heavy material. I had to return due to handle cover popping off.
customer_reviews.author: MeetTheMets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The handle fell off within the first couple pulls with this rake, and after a couple weeks the rake head pulled out of the pole. Complete garbage, and of course I’m now out of my return window....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiskers garden rake
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was commercial quality. It is just an overpriced homeowner rake.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I'm going to break it
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good item, but it feels a bit flimsy. For the money, I would prefer for it to not feel so delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and strong.
customer_reviews.text: The rake works great and is light weight. Bought all the Fiskars garden tools and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. I was expecting a rake as diesel as ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I was expecting a rake as diesel as the straight handled digging shovel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Balduino

product_meta.title: Fiskars Ergo Aluminum Garden Rake (60 Inch)
product_meta.description: The Aluminum Garden Rake features 14 hardened steel tines that rip through tough soil and hardened dirt clods when you’re loosening soil for planting, leveling soil or doing a little light weeding. It’s also a great choice for ripping dead, brown patches of grass out of your lawn for reseeding. The strong aluminum handle provides excellent durability, while reducing weight for easy use. Plus, a teardrop-shaped shaft is enhanced with a Softgrip handle and a mid grip for exceptional comfort and control. A hang hole allows for convenient storage in your shed or garage.
feature_bullets: Loosen and level soil in the garden or remove dead grass from lawns with a durable aluminum garden rake featuring 14 hardened steel tines
Strong and lightweight aluminum shaft provides lasting durability and reduced weight for easy use
Softgrip handle and mid grip improve control and help insulate against the cold
Teardrop-shaped shaft fits the natural shape of your hand and includes a mid grip for exceptional comfort and control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
